cmcR 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Reproduction of Song et al. (2018) plots using the cmcR package
    • Reproducible Example

Reference

All functions

ccfMapPlot()

Plots the CCF map between two matrices

cellCCF()

Calculates the cross-correlation function between cells in one matrix to regions in another.

cellCCF_bothDirections()

Applies cellCCF function twice for a pair of cartridge case scans.

cmcFilter()

Implements CMC logic on a single data frame as proposed by Song (2013).

cmcFilter_improved()

Implements "improved" CMC logic on a list of CCF results for a comparison between two cartridge case scans as proposed by Tong et al. (2015)

cmcPerThetaBarPlot()

Create a bar plot of congruent matching cells per rotation value

cmcPlot()

Visualize initial and high CMCs for a cartridge case pair comparison

congruentMatchingCells()

Identifies the congruent matching cells between two processed cartridge case scans

getMode()

Calculates the mode of a vector of numbers

preProcess_cropWS()

Crop out rows/columns outside of the breech face impression in a cartridge case scan.

preProcess_gaussFilter()

Performs a low, high, or bandpass Gaussian filter on a surface matrix with a particular cut-off wavelength.

preProcess_levelBF()

Levels a breech face impression matrix basedo on a RANSAC-fitted plane

preProcess_ransac()

Finds plane of breechface marks using the RANSAC method

preProcess_removeFPCircle()

Given a surface matrix, estimates and filters any pixels within the estimated firing pin impression circle

selectBFImpression()

Select breech face impression from a cartridge case scan

selectBFImpression_resize()

Select breech face impression from a cartridge case scan after using imager::resize to resize the scan.

selectBFImpression_sample_x3p()

Select breech face impression from a cartridge case scan after using x3ptools::sample_x3p to downsample the scan.

topResultsPerCell()

Calculate dx, dy, theta values at which top similarity is achieved in a cell pair.

Contents
